_sText:
Okay this is what i've been working on the last couple of days... I will say that this is probably the best map i've made so far, its the one i've spent the most time on.. Custom textures as usual.. Some from valve aswell, but that's in the bonus area..

I think its a pretty great map actually.. It's for avarage hoppers i think..

Enjoy

-------------------------------
bhop\_underground\_fix
-------------------------------

- Changed the setting for better hopping on the blocks.
- The water texture, fixed the size of it.
